title: Olympia Tour from Athens
text:
Day trip to Olympia. Bus was in excellent condition and on time. We arrived and returned on schedule.
What we didn't like was that the driver was speeding and didn't respect traffic laws. This might be a common thing in Greece, however it spoiled our trip. When we tried to discuss this with him, he rejected us in a not very polite way.

title: Mediocre
text:
We stayed for one night. Hosts were kind and the building is very new, however it's located in a dull and uninteresting suburb, with nothing around to pass the time.
Bathroom was not very clean and breakfast was nothing special, with few choices.

title: Excellent
text: A great look into the Ancient Greek civilization. Excellent museum, easy to navigate and see everything, better with a guided tour

title: Very good, but common
text: Really nice restaurant, however food lets you down a bit. Serves both traditional and modern dishes, but the taste is very common, nothing special.

title: Amazing !
text: This is a must visit for all visitors to Athens. Nice views of the city and you really get the feeling that you're part of the ancient city.

title: Amazing !
text: Visit the Acropolis museum first and then the Parthenon. One in a lifetime experience and something you must not miss even if you stay for only 1 day in Athens.

title: A must visit when in Athens
text:
Combined with the climb to the Parthenon this is a must see for every visitor to Athens.
Easily accessible via the metro system, go early if you want to avoid the long lines.
